document_data.name: Beralt
document_data.mainbody: '''Beralt''' was a boy member of the [[Emerald Enclave]] in the [[Moonsea]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Harried in Hillsfar|11}}
document_data.Activities: Beralt studied as a [[druid]] under a master and was a member of the Emerald Enclave.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], his master sent him near [[Hillsfar]] to investigate corrupted creatures. There he saved the boy [[tiefling]] [[Pynroth]] from some wild dogs, with the help of some adventurers who happened to be near the farmhouse.{{Cite adventurers league/Harried in Hillsfar|12}}
